Title: The One Where Monica Gets a Roommate: The Pilot
Abstract: Monica and the gang introduce Rachel to the real world after she leaves her fianc√© at the altar.

Title: The One with the Sonogram at the End
Abstract: Ross finds out his ex-wife is pregnant. Rachel returns her engagement ring to Barry. Monica becomes stressed when her and Ross's parents come to visit.

Title: The One with the Thumb
Abstract: Monica becomes irritated when everyone likes her new boyfriend more than she does. Chandler resumes his smoking habit. Phoebe is given $7000 when she finds a thumb in a can of soda.

Title: The One with George Stephanopoulos
Abstract: Joey and Chandler take Ross to a hockey game to take his mind off the anniversary of the first time he slept with Carol while the girls become depressed when they realize they don't have a plan.

Title: The One with the East German Laundry Detergent
Abstract: Eager to spend time with Rachel Ross pretends his washroom is rat-infested so he can join her at the laundromat. Meanwhile Joey has Monica pose as his girlfriend and Chandler struggles to break up with his girlfriend.

Title: The One with the Butt
Abstract: Monica's obsessiveness is put to the test after Rachel cleans the apartment. Joey lands a film role as Al Pacino's butt double. Chandler enjoys a relationship with all of the fun but none of the responsibility.

Title: The One with the Blackout
Abstract: When New York suffers from a blackout Ross tries to tell Rachel that he likes her and Chandler gets stuck in an ATM vestibule with a model.

Title: The One Where Nana Dies Twice
Abstract: Monica and Ross mourn the loss of their grandmother. Chandler is shocked to find that people think he is gay.

Title: The One Where Underdog Gets Away
Abstract: The gang's plans for Thanksgiving go awry after they get locked out of Monica and Rachel's apartment.

Title: The One with the Monkey
Abstract: The gang make (and break) a pact not to bring dates to their New Years Eve party. Phoebe starts dating a scientist. Ross compensates for his loneliness by getting a monkey.

Title: The One with Mrs. Bing
Abstract: Chandler's flamboyant romance-novelist mother comes to visit and Joey catches her kissing Ross. Meanwhile Monica and Phoebe fight over a guy in a coma.

Title: The One with the Dozen Lasagnas
Abstract: Rachel and Paolo's relationship hits a snag when he makes a pss at Phoebe. Ross refuses to find out the sex of his baby until it's born. Chandler and Joey go shopping for a new kitchen table.

Title: The One with the Boobies
Abstract: Joey finds out his dad has a mistress. Rachel tries to even the score after Chandler inadvertently catches a glimpse of her breasts. Phoebe dates a shrink who analyzes the gang.

Title: The One with the Candy Hearts
Abstract: As Valentine's Day approaches Ross and his date end up at the same restaurant as Carol and Susan. Joey inadvertently sets Chandler up on a blind date with Janice and the girls burn mementos of their old boyfriends.

Title: The One with the Stoned Guy
Abstract: Monica cooks a gourmet meal for a restaurateur who is looking for a new chef however he arrives at the apartment stoned. Meanwhile Ross tries to master dirty talk.

Title: The One with Two Parts: Part 1
Abstract: Phoebe feels neglected when Joey falls for her twin sister. Chandler struggles to fire an attractive co-worker. Ross attends Lamaze classes with Carol and Susan.

Title: The One with Two Parts: Part 2
Abstract: Rachel switches identities with Monica so she can use her health insurance. Meanwhile Ursula continues to come between Phoebe and Joey.

Title: The One with All the Poker
Abstract: As Rachel interviews for a new job the girls take on the guys in a game of poker.

Title: The One Where the Monkey Gets Away
Abstract: The gang frantically search for Ross's monkey Marcel after Rachel loses him.

Title: The One with the Evil Orthodontist
Abstract: Rachel and Barry start dating again despite the fact that he's now engaged to Mindy. Chandler goes nuts when a woman he likes won't return his phone calls.

Title: The One with the Fake Monica
Abstract: Monica befriends the woman who stole her credit card. Ross is forced to give away Marcel. Joey tries to come up with a less ethnic-sounding stage name.

Title: The One with the Ick Factor
Abstract: Monica gets a shock when she finds out her boyfriend is a high school student. Chandler finds out his colleagues don't like him when Phoebe temps as his secretary.

Title: The One with the Birth
Abstract: As Carol goes into labor Ross and Susan argue. Rachel flirts with Carol's doctor and Joey assists a pregnant single mother.

Title: The One Where Rachel Finds Out
Abstract: As Ross leaves for China Chandler accidentally reveals Ross's feelings for Rachel. Joey takes part in a fertility study and is unable to sleep with his new girlfriend.

Title: The One with Ross's New Girlfriend
Abstract: Rachel waits for Ross at the airport unaware he has a new girlfriend. Meanwhile Chandler has a frightening experience with Joey's tailor and Phoebe gives Monica a bad haircut.

Title: The One with the Breast Milk
Abstract: Monica goes shopping with Julie and tries to keep it a secret from Rachel. Ross is grossed out by Carol's breast milk. At his day job Joey competes with a fellow cologne spritzer.

Title: The One Where Heckles Dies
Abstract: After Mr. Heckles dies and leaves all his belongings to Monica and Rachel Chandler worries he will die alone just like him. Meanwhile Phoebe and Ross argue over evolution.

Title: The One with Phoebe's Husband
Abstract: When the gang find out Phoebe married a gay Canadian ice dancer for a green card more of their secrets are revealed. Meanwhile Rachel gives Ross bad advice on his relationship with Julie.

Title: The One with Five Steaks and an Eggplant
Abstract: The gang are divided by income issues: Monica Ross and Chandler have money and Rachel Phoebe and Joey don't.

Title: The One with the Baby on the Bus
Abstract: Joey and Chandler are left to babysit Ben when Monica takes Ross to the hospital. Meanwhile Phoebe loses her singing gig at Central Perk to a professional singer.

Title: The One Where Ross Finds Out
Abstract: A drunken Rachel calls Ross and reveals her feelings for him on his answering machine. Meanwhile Monica keeps busy by being Chandler's personal trainer and Phoebe constantly wonders why her current boyfriend won't sleep with her.

Title: The One with the List
Abstract: With help from Chandler and Joey Ross makes a list of pros and cons to decide whether to be with Julie or Rachel. Meanwhile Monica gets a job making dessert with a disgusting synthetic chocolate substitute.

Title: The One with Phoebe's Dad
Abstract: Phoebe tracks down her father but isn't sure whether she should meet him. Ross asks Rachel to make a list of pros and cons about him.

Title: The One with Russ
Abstract: Monica gets back together with 'Fun Bobby' and realizes why he is always so upbeat. Rachel starts dating a guy called Russ who bears an uncanny resemblance to Ross.

Title: The One with the Lesbian Wedding
Abstract: Rachel's mom comes to visit with big news. Monica caters Carol and Susan's wedding. Phoebe becomes 'possessed' by the spirit of a recently deceased client.

Title: The One After the Superbowl: Part 1
Abstract: Ross goes to visit Marcel whilst on a trip to California and discovers he is working in commercials. Joey receives a fan letter from an attractive but unstable woman. Phoebe is asked to sing for children at a library.

Title: The One After the Superbowl: Part 2
Abstract: Ross finds Marcel on the set of a new movie where Chandler bumps into a former schoolmate. Meanwhile Rachel and Monica compete for the affections of Jean-Claude Van Damme.

Title: The One with the Prom Video
Abstract: The gang watches a home video from the night of Monica and Rachel's prom. Joey gives Chandler a hideous bracelet.

Title: The One Where Ross and Rachel... You Know
Abstract: Monica becomes infatuated with a friend of her parents when she caters a party for him. Ross and Rachel go on their first date. Joey and Chandler refuse to move when they get a new TV and two armchairs.

Title: The One Where Joey Moves Out
Abstract: Joey and Chandler's friendship is jeopardized when Joey decides to move out. Monica worries about her parents finding out about her relationship with Richard when they attend a party together. Rachel and Phoebe go to get tattoos.

Title: The One Where Eddie Moves In
Abstract: Chandler gets a new roommate. Phoebe gets the chance to make a music video for her song 'Smelly Cat'. Ross and Monica clash when he is always at her and Rachel's apartment.

Title: The One Where Dr. Ramoray Dies
Abstract: Joey's soap opera character is killed off after he brags in an interview that he writes his own lines. Chandler is unnerved by Eddie's strange behavior while Ross and Rachel compare their past lovers as do Richard and Monica.

Title: The One Where Eddie Won't Go
Abstract: Chandler demands that Eddie move out however he doesn't seem to get the message. Meanwhile a book on empowerment for women inspires the girls. In order to pay his bills Ross convinces Joey to audition for a role he doesn't want.

Title: The One Where Old Yeller Dies
Abstract: Phoebe's world view is shattered when she learns how Old Yeller really ends. Monica becomes jealous when Richard starts hanging out with Chandler and Joey. Rachel panics when she learns that Ross has planned their whole life together.

Title: The One with the Bullies
Abstract: Chandler and Ross run into two bullies at Central Perk. Monica tries her luck at the stock market to avoid taking a job at a 1950s themed diner. Phoebe drives upstate for a second time to meet her father while Joey and Rachel accompany her.

Title: The One with the Two Parties
Abstract: Chaos ensues when Rachel's recently divorced parents show up at her surprise birthday party so the gang has to find ways to keep her parents separated otherwise they'll start fighting.

Title: The One with the Chicken Pox
Abstract: Phoebe catches chicken pox just as an old flame arrives in town on leave from the Navy. Joey gets a job at Chandler's office. Monica is upset that Richard doesn't have any quirks.

Title: The One with Barry and Mindy's Wedding
Abstract: Rachel reluctantly agrees to be maid of honor at her ex-fianc√É¬© Barry's wedding. Monica ponders her future with Richard. Joey has to practice kissing guys to get a role in Warren Beatty's new movie but Ross and Chandler are unwilling to help him.

Title: The One with the Princess Leia Fantasy
Abstract: Monica suffers from insomnia and depression following her breakup with Richard. Joey struggles to accept Chandler and Janice's relationship. Ross confides in Rachel about one of his fantasies.

Title: The One Where No One's Ready
Abstract: A stressed Ross desperately and insistently tries to get the rest of the gang ready for a black tie event at the museum while Joey and Chandler clash over personal belongings and personal space.

Title: The One with the Jam
Abstract: Monica tries to get over Richard by using her free time to make jam and considers artificial insemination through a sperm bank. Phoebe is stalked by a man who mistakes her for Ursula.

Title: The One with the Metaphorical Tunnel
Abstract: Chandler tries to get over his fear of commitment. Phoebe poses as Joey's agent after she forgets to tell him about an audition. Ross panics after seeing Ben play with a Barbie doll and tries to convince him to play with more manly toys.

Title: The One with Frank Jr.
Abstract: Phoebe has trouble bonding with her half-brother Frank when he comes to visit. Joey attempts to build an entertainment center. Ross is challenged to name the five celebrities he'd like to sleep with most.

Title: The One with the Flashback
Abstract: The gang remember the events three years ago when several of them almost slept together.

Title: The One with the Race Car Bed
Abstract: Monica buys a bed from Janice's soon to be ex husband. Ross and Rachel have dinner with Rachel's father. Joey leads an acting class.

Title: The One with the Giant Poking Device
Abstract: Chandler is devastated after Joey tells him he saw Janice kissing her ex-husband. Monica accidentally bumps Ben's head into a post when she and Rachel babysit. Phoebe is paranoid if she goes to dentist someone she knows will die.

Title: The One with the Football
Abstract: Old sibling rivalry between Monica and Ross resurfaces and postpones Thanksgiving dinner when the gang decide to play a game of 'touch' football.

Title: The One Where Rachel Quits
Abstract: Ross accidentally breaks a little girl's leg and tries to help her sell boxes of cookies which recreates Monica's childhood fixation. Rachel quits her job at Central Perk and Joey's Christmas tree selling conflicts with Phoebe's principles.

Title: The One Where Chandler Can't Remember Which Sister
Abstract: A drunken Chandler fools around with one of Joey's sisters - but he can't remember which one. Ross becomes skeptical when a guy at the diner gets Rachel an interview for a position at Bloomingdales.

Title: The One with All the Jealousy
Abstract: Ross becomes insanely jealous of Mark. Monica hooks up with a co-worker who writes her a poem with a hidden meaning. One of Joey's numerous lies on his resume is exposed when he takes part in a Broadway production.

Title: The One Where Monica and Richard Are Just Friends
Abstract: Monica's willpower is tested when she bumps into Richard. Joey and Rachel exchange their favorite books. Phoebe dates an athletic guy who doesn't realize he has a 'wardrobe malfunction'.

Title: The One with Phoebe's Ex-Partner
Abstract: Phoebe is reunited with her former singing partner who thinks 'Smelly Cat' has hit potential. Chandler dates a woman with a prosthetic leg.

Title: The One Where Ross and Rachel Take a Break
Abstract: Ross seeks solace at a party after a bitter fight with Rachel and ends up in the arms of another woman. Phoebe's date needs an interpreter to communicate.

Title: The One with the Morning After
Abstract: Ross is guilt-ridden after sleeping with Chloe and desperately tries to stop Rachel from finding out and when she does the rest of the gang listen to them argue and end up trapped in Monica's room for the rest of the night.

Title: The One Without the Ski Trip
Abstract: Monica Chandler Phoebe and Joey become stuck in the middle of Ross and Rachel's fight following their break-up.

Title: The One with the Hypnosis Tape
Abstract: Monica goes out with a guy who turns out to be a software billionaire. Chandler's stop smoking hypnosis tape has an unexpected side effect. Frank makes a surprise announcement that he is getting married - to a woman twice his age.

Title: The One with the Tiny T-Shirt
Abstract: Rachel goes on her first date after splitting from Ross with Mark. Joey clashes with his co-star in his new play. Monica continues to date Pete even though she is still not attracted to him.

Title: The One with the Dollhouse
Abstract: Monica's aunt dies and leaves her an antique dollhouse that she doesn't want Phoebe to play with. Rachel regrets setting up Chandler with her boss Joanna.

Title: The One with the Chick and the Duck
Abstract: Joey buys a chick for him and Chandler. Pete offers Monica a job at his restaurant but she is undecided if she should accept it. Ross shows his continued feelings for Rachel when he gives up being on TV for her.

Title: The One with the Screamer
Abstract: Ross witnesses Rachel's date screaming at people. Meanwhile Joey becomes upset when Kate is offered a job in Los Angeles. Phoebe refuses to hang up the phone when she is placed on hold by her phone company.

Title: The One with Ross's Thing
Abstract: Ross seeks medical help when he finds a mysterious skin condition on his backside. Phoebe struggles to choose between two guys. Monica can't decide what to do about Pete when she thinks he is going to propose.

Title: The One with the Ultimate Fighting Champion
Abstract: Monica struggles to support Pete in his goal to become the Ultimate Fighting Champion. Chandler is uneasy when his boss playfully slaps his butt. Rachel becomes jealous when Ross starts dating a woman that was introduced to him by Phoebe.

Title: The One at the Beach
Abstract: While at the beach Phoebe meets a family friend with links to her past. Ross discovers that Rachel still loves him and must decide between her and Bonnie.

Title: The One with the Jellyfish
Abstract: Ross chooses between Rachel and his bald-headed girlfriend Bonnie. Joey Chandler and Monica have a perilous encounter with a jellyfish at the beach.

Title: The One with the Cat
Abstract: Phoebe becomes convinced that the spirit of her dead mother is inside a cat. Chandler and Joey are robbed. Monica goes on a date with a guy from her high school.

Title: The One with the 'Cuffs
Abstract: Monica tries to avoid criticism when she caters a party for her mother. Chandler ends up half naked and handcuffed to a chair in Rachel's boss's office. Joey tries to get educated from a salesman trying to sell him a set of encyclopedias.

Title: The One with the Ballroom Dancing
Abstract: Joey is forced to help Treeger learn how to dance after he threatens to have Monica and Rachel evicted. Phoebe develops a crush on one of her clients. Ross tries to help Chandler quit the gym.

Title: The One with Joey's New Girlfriend
Abstract: Chandler develops feelings for Joey's new girlfriend. Ross and Rachel try to make each other jealous with their dates. Phoebe's cold gives her a sexy singing voice.

Title: The One with the Dirty Girl
Abstract: Ross's new girlfriend is nearly perfect until he discovers her apartment is very dirty. Chandler buys a better birthday present for Kathy than Joey. Phoebe helps Monica cater an event. Rachel is obsessed at finishing a crossword puzzle by herself.

Title: The One Where Chandler Crosses the Line
Abstract: Chandler is guilt-ridden after kissing Kathy. Ross starts playing the keyboard again and everyone except Phoebe thinks he's terrible. Joey dates someone else while still attached to Kathy.

Title: The One with Chandler in a Box
Abstract: Chandler tries to earn Joey's forgiveness by lying in a wooden box for six hours. Monica accidentally gets ice in her eye and her doctor turns out to be Richard's son and it's discovered Rachel exchanges the gifts she received in the past.

Title: The One Where They're Going to Party!
Abstract: Monica ends up having to choose between a head chef position or the catering business she started with Phoebe. Rachel is close to getting a promotion but tragedy strikes. Chandler and Ross are excited when an old friend is coming to town.

Title: The One with the Girl from Poughkeepsie
Abstract: In order for her kitchen staff to acknowledge her authority Monica hires Joey so she can fire him in front of them. Chandler unsuccessfully tries to set Rachel up with a co-worker. Ross can't choose between two girls.

Title: The One with Phoebe's Uterus
Abstract: Newlyweds Frank and Alice ask Phoebe to be their surrogate. Joey gets a job as a tour guide at Ross's museum. Chandler asks Monica and Rachel for advice on how to sexually satisfy Kathy.

Title: The One with the Embryos
Abstract: Phoebe's uterus is examined for implantation of the embryos. Meanwhile a seemingly harmless game between Chandler and Joey against Monica and Rachel escalates into a full blown contest where the stakes are raised higher and higher.

Title: The One with Rachel's Crush
Abstract: After seeing Kathy's play Chandler becomes convinced she is cheating on him with her co-star. Rachel develops a crush on one of her customers. Monica becomes jealous when she realizes she is no longer the 'hostess'.

Title: The One with Joey's Dirty Day
Abstract: Joey arrives on the set of his latest movie unwashed after a three-day fishing trip with his dad. Rachel sets up Ross with the niece of her boss. Chandler goes through three phrases to help recover from Kathy cheating on him.

Title: The One with All the Rugby
Abstract: Chandler runs into Janice and finds her more irritating than ever and creates an elaborate plan to break up with her. meanwhile Ross attempts to learn how to play rugby to impress Emily and Monica obsesses over a electric lighting switch.

Title: The One with the Fake Party
Abstract: Rachel organizes a fake good bye party for Emily so she can spend time with Joshua. A side effect from her pregnancy causes Phoebe to have a craving for meat.

Title: The One with the Free Porn
Abstract: Chandler and Joey discover that they're getting a free porn channel on their TV. Monica encourages Ross to tell Emily he loves her just before she leaves for London. Phoebe gets a shock when she visits her OB-GYN.

Title: The One with Rachel's New Dress
Abstract: Rachel has an awkward encounter with Joshua's parents. Phoebe is offered the chance to name one of the triplets. Ross becomes paranoid when Emily goes to London with Susan.

Title: The One with All the Haste
Abstract: Ross proposes to Emily. Monica and Rachel try to win their apartment back from Chandler and Joey.

Title: The One with All the Wedding Dresses
Abstract: Monica tries on Emily's wedding dress and can't stop wearing it. Jealous of Ross's proposal to Emily Rachel tries to talk Joshua into marriage. Chandler takes Joey to a sleep clinic when he starts snoring.

Title: The One with the Invitation
Abstract: As Ross and Emily send out wedding invitations he and Rachel each look back on their relationship together while Joey and Chandler look for a purpose in life.

Title: The One with the Worst Best Man Ever
Abstract: At first Ross chooses Joey to be his best man but after a mishap at his bachelor party he decides he wants both Joey and Chandler as his best men. Phoebe's mood swings makes Monica and Rachel nervous.

Title: The One with Ross's Wedding
Abstract: Phoebe tries to help Rachel deal with her feelings for Ross as the rest of the gang head to London for Ross and Emily's wedding while someone else unexpectedly shows up to the wedding.

Title: The One with Ross's Wedding
Abstract: Phoebe tries to warn the gang that Rachel is coming to London to tell Ross she still loves him. Ross and Emily's parents get into an argument over the bill for the wedding. Monica and Chandler sleep together. The wedding ends with a gaffe.

Title: The One After Ross Says Rachel
Abstract: A humiliated Emily runs away after Ross says Rachel's name at the altar. Meanwhile Chandler and Monica struggle to get time alone together.

Title: The One with All the Kissing
Abstract: Chandler must constantly kiss the girls to cover up a kiss he gave to Monica to hide their affair. Phoebe gets irritated when the gang constantly talk about London. Rachel puts Monica in charge of her love life. Ross tries to contact Emily.

Title: The One Hundredth
Abstract: The gang take Phoebe to the hospital after she goes into labor. Monica threatens to go on a date with a male nurse after Chandler claims they are 'just goofing around'. Joey gets treated for kidney stones.

Title: The One Where Phoebe Hates PBS
Abstract: Ross finally gets in touch with Emily and they try to work it out. Chandler gloats after Rachel reveals that Monica's secret boyfriend is the best sex she ever had. Phoebe and Joey debate if a selfless good deed exists.

Title: The One with the Kips
Abstract: Chandler and Monica go away for the weekend but spend the entire time fighting. Ross tries to tell Rachel about his agreement with Emily.

Title: The One with the Yeti
Abstract: The gang become frustrated with Emily's demands to Ross. Monica and Rachel mistake their new neighbor for a yeti. Phoebe receives a fur coat as a family heirloom from her mother.

Title: The One Where Ross Moves In
Abstract: Ross moves in with Chandler and Joey after Emily's cousin kicks him out of his apartment. Phoebe dates a health inspector. Rachel plays hard-to-get with Danny.

Title: The One with All the Thanksgivings
Abstract: The gang remember and share with each other their worst Thanksgivings.

Title: The One with Ross's Sandwich
Abstract: Joey finds himself constantly covering for Chandler and Monica's affair. Ross becomes angry when someone at work eats his sandwich. Phoebe and Rachel enroll in a literature class.

Title: The One with the Inappropriate Sister
Abstract: A bored Ross wreaks havoc in Chandler and Joey's lives. Rachel is uncomfortable with Danny's unusually close relationship with his sister. Phoebe runs into trouble whilst collecting donations for the poor during Christmas.

Title: The One with All the Resolutions
Abstract: The gang make their New Years resolutions. Chandler struggles to not make jokes about everyone. Rachel uncovers a secret. Ross runs into trouble when he wears leather pants on a date.

Title: The One with Chandler's Work Laugh
Abstract: Monica becomes annoyed at how Chandler sucks up to his boss by mimicking his boss's laugh and laughing at his tasteless jokes. Ross hooks up with Janice when he finds out Emily is getting married.

Title: The One with Joey's Bag
Abstract: Phoebe's grandmother dies and is shocked when her father turns up at the funeral. Meanwhile Rachel gives Joey a man's bag for an audition and Chandler is scared to tell Monica he doesn't like her massages.

Title: The One Where Everybody Finds Out
Abstract: When Phoebe finds out about Monica and Chandler she and Rachel attempt to get them to confess their relationship.

Title: The One with the Girl Who Hits Joey
Abstract: Ross makes enemies out of his new neighbors. Chandler freaks out about his relationship with Monica. Joey dates a girl who likes to playfully punch him but she doesn't realize she punches him too hard and Joey is reluctant to tell her.

Title: The One with the Cop
Abstract: Joey has a dream about Monica and becomes convinced he is in love with her. Meanwhile Phoebe finds a police badge in Central Perk and Ross tries to get his new sofa into his apartment.

Title: The One with Rachel's Inadvertent Kiss
Abstract: Rachel has an awkward encounter when she interviews for a new job. Monica becomes jealous of Phoebe and Gary. Joey searches for a 'hot girl' in Ross's building.

Title: The One Where Rachel Smokes
Abstract: Rachel takes up smoking to feel more included at work. Joey auditions for a soup commercial with Ross's son Ben but they end up competing against each other. Monica and Phoebe plan Rachel's surprise birthday party one month in advance.

Title: The One Where Ross Can't Flirt
Abstract: As Joey's grandmother visits to watch him on TV Ross has trouble flirting with the pizza delivery girl and Rachel tries to find an earring of Monica's that she has misplaced.

Title: The One with the Ride Along
Abstract: The guys go on a ride-along with Gary. Rachel accidentally deletes a message from Emily on Ross's answering machine.

Title: The One with the Ball
Abstract: Gary asks Phoebe to move in with him but she's reluctant to and to overcome boredom. Ross and Joey start throwing a ball to each other. Rachel buys an expensive cat but it doesn't behave as she hoped it would.

Title: The One with Joey's Big Break
Abstract: Joey drives to Las Vegas to shoot to shoot a new movie where he is in the lead role. Rachel gets an eye infection but is reluctant to seek treatment because of her eye phobia. Phoebe is mad at Ross but doesn't know why.

Title: The One in Vegas: Part 1
Abstract: The gang go to Las Vegas to visit Joey. Chandler is angry when he finds out Monica had lunch with Richard. Ross and Rachel try to embarrass each other after an awkward encounter.

Title: The One in Vegas: Part 2
Abstract: Chandler and Monica reconcile and hastily decide to get married. Ross and Rachel get drunk and roam the casino. Phoebe deals with a 'lurker' on the slot machines.

Title: The One After Vegas
Abstract: Ross and Rachel deal with the aftermath of their drunken escapade. Phoebe and Joey take a road trip back to New York in Phoebe's grandmother's cab. Monica and Chandler ponder the idea of marriage.

Title: The One Where Ross Hugs Rachel
Abstract: Monica and Chandler try to tell Rachel and Joey that they're moving in together. Phoebe thinks that Ross didn't get the annulment because he still loves Rachel.

Title: The One with Ross's Denial
Abstract: Ross tries to deny he still has feelings for Rachel. Joey interviews for a new roommate. Monica and Chandler argue over what to do with the spare room when they move in together.

Title: The One Where Joey Loses His Insurance
Abstract: Joey's health benefits lapse just as he develops a hernia. Ross is given a professorship at NYU and eager to impress his students he puts on a fake English accent.

Title: The One with Joey's Porsche
Abstract: Ross and Rachel try to get an annulment. Joey finds the keys to a porsche in Central Perk and Phoebe Monica and Chandler babysit the triplets.

Title: The One on the Last Night
Abstract: On the last night before Chandler and Monica move in together Monica and Rachel argue and Chandler tries to give Joey money to help him pay the bills.

Title: The One Where Phoebe Runs
Abstract: Rachel is embarrassed by Phoebe's odd running style. Joey gets a new roommate. Chandler tries to impress Monica by cleaning the apartment but forgets how everything is supposed to look.

Title: The One with Ross' Teeth
Abstract: Ross goes too far while trying to impress a date by over-whitening his teeth. Rachel uses gossip to get her boss to like her after Phoebe supposedly makes out with Ralph Lauren.

Title: The One Where Ross Got High
Abstract: Ross is forced to reveal the reason why Jack and Judy don't like Chandler. Rachel tries to make dessert for the gang. Joey and Ross try to get out of Thanksgiving when they are invited to hang out with Janine and her dancer friends.

Title: The One with the Routine
Abstract: On the set of Dick Clark's New Year's Rockin' Eve Joey tries to kiss Janine at midnight and Monica and Ross resurrect their dance routine from high school. Meanwhile Rachel Phoebe and Chandler look for Monica's Christmas presents.

Title: The One with the Apothecary Table
Abstract: Joey is caught in the middle when Janine tells him she doesn't like Monica and Chandler. Meanwhile Rachel buys an apothecary table from a store that Phoebe hates.

Title: The One with the Joke
Abstract: Chandler and Ross argue over a joke. Meanwhile Joey reluctantly takes a waiter job at Central Perk and Monica becomes annoyed when Phoebe says she would choose Rachel over her as a girlfriend.

Title: The One with Rachel's Sister
Abstract: Rachel's younger sister arrives in New York and goes on a date with Ross. Meanwhile Monica won't admit that she is sick.

Title: The One Where Chandler Can't Cry
Abstract: Rachel tries to end the spark between Ross and Jill. When Chandler admits that he can't cry Monica tries to make it happen. The gang discovers that Phoebe's sister Ursula is a porn star and is using Phoebe's name.

Title: The One That Could Have Been
Abstract: When Rachel hears Barry and Mindy are getting divorced the gang wonder how different their lives could have been.

Title: The One That Could Have Been
Abstract: The gang continue to think about how different their lives could have been.

Title: The One with Unagi
Abstract: Rachel and Phoebe take self-defense classes. Chandler and Monica agree to give each other homemade presents for Valentine's Day. Joey tries to get money through medical research.

Title: The One Where Ross Dates a Student
Abstract: Ross jeopardizes his career when he starts dating a student from one of his palaeontology classes. Rachel and Phoebe's apartment catches fire.

Title: The One with Joey's Fridge
Abstract: Joey tries to get everyone to pay for his broken fridge. Ross becomes paranoid when Elizabeth makes plans for spring break. Monica and Chandler compete against Phoebe to find Rachel a date.

Title: The One with Mac and C.H.E.E.S.E.
Abstract: Chandler forgets to write down a message for Joey when the time of his audition for the lead in a TV show is changed.

Title: The One Where Ross Meets Elizabeth's Dad
Abstract: Elizabeth's father takes an instant disliking to Ross. Joey almost gets fired from 'Mac and C.H.E.E.S.E.' after offending the operator of the robot. Phoebe writes a book based on Monica and Chandler.

Title: The One Where Paul's the Man
Abstract: Paul threatens to have Ross fired from the university if he continues to date Elizabeth. The girls put their names down on a waiting list for a wedding venue.

Title: The One with the Ring
Abstract: Chandler and Phoebe go looking for an engagement ring for Monica. Rachel tries to get Paul to open up to her.

Title: The One with the Proposal
Abstract: Chandler's plan to propose to Monica at dinner is interrupted by Richard. Joey accidentally buys a boat at a silent auction. Ross and Elizabeth's relationship comes to a crossroad.

Title: The One with the Proposal
Abstract: Chandler continues to pretend to hate the idea of marriage unaware Richard wants Monica back. Meanwhile Rachel and Phoebe discuss their 'back-up' plans.

Title: The One with Monica's Thunder
Abstract: The gang celebrate Monica and Chandler's engagement however Ross and Rachel upstage them by briefly reuniting. Joey tries to dress and act like a nineteen-year-old for an audition.

Title: The One with Rachel's Book
Abstract: Monica learns her parents have spent her entire wedding fund. Phoebe temporarily moves into Ross's apartment bringing her massage clients with her. Joey mocks Rachel when he finds an erotic novel she is reading.

Title: The One with Phoebe's Cookies
Abstract: Monica tries to figure out Phoebe's grandmother's secret cookie recipe. Meanwhile Rachel tries to teach Joey how to sail and Chandler has an awkward encounter when he tries to bond with Jack.

Title: The One with Rachel's Assistant
Abstract: Chaos ensues when Monica and Chandler decide to share each other's secrets. Rachel gets a promotion and interviews for an assistant. Joey is offered the chance to go back on 'Days of Our Lives'.

Title: The One with the Engagement Picture
Abstract: Chandler struggles to photograph well for his and Monica's engagement picture. Joey teaches Tag how to pick up women much to Rachel's annoyance. Phoebe and Ross date a couple who are divorcing.

Title: The One with the Nap Partners
Abstract: Joey and Ross accidentally take a nap together - and much to their dismay find that they like it. Phoebe and Rachel compete to become Monica's maid of honor.

Title: The One with Ross's Library Book
Abstract: Ross and Chandler discovers that Ross's book is in the section of the library where students go to have sex. Monica and Chandler run into Janice and she immediately invites herself to the wedding. They try to avoid her. Meanwhile Rachel and Phoebe befriend Joey's girlfriend.

Title: The One Where Chandler Doesn't Like Dogs
Abstract: Ross struggles to name all 50 states in a game. Joey compromises Rachel's chances with her crush Tag during Thanksgiving dinner. Phoebe sneaks a dog into the apartment making Chandler extremely nervous.

Title: The One with All the Candy
Abstract: Monica makes candy to get to know her neighbours. Rachel and Tag try to hide their relationship at work and Ross buys Phoebe a bike.

Title: The One with the Holiday Armadillo
Abstract: Ross wants to introduce Ben to Hanukkah. In order to entice Rachel to move back into their refurbished apartment Phoebe must drive a wedge between Rachel and current roomie Joey.

Title: The One with All the Cheesecakes
Abstract: Chandler refuses to give back a cheesecake accidentally delivered to his apartment. Phoebe gets angry with Joey when he blows off dinner with her for a date.

Title: The One Where They're Up All Night
Abstract: After the gang head up to the roof to see a passing comet separate events unfold that lead to them all having a sleepless night.

Title: The One Where Rosita Dies
Abstract: Rachel breaks Joey's armchair. Phoebe takes a temp job in a call centre. Ross and Monica find out their parents are selling their childhood home.

Title: The One Where They All Turn Thirty
Abstract: Rachel's 30th birthday prompts the rest of the gang to reminisce about their own 30th celebrations.

Title: The One with Joey's New Brain
Abstract: Joey gets training from the actress he is replacing on 'Days of Our Lives'. Rachel and Phoebe find a cute guy's cellphone in Central Perk and fight over who gets to call him to return it. Ross practices playing bagpipes for Monica and Chandler's wedding much to their horror.

Title: The One with the Truth About London
Abstract: Chandler is shocked to find out who Monica really wanted to sleep with the night they first got together. Meanwhile Rachel gets into trouble with Ross when she teaches Ben practical jokes.

Title: The One with the Cheap Wedding Dress
Abstract: Monica Rachel and Phoebe go to a wedding-dress sale to buy the dress Monica picked out. Ross has a date with Kristen who just moved in across the street but the problem is that Joey had a date with her too. They will let Kristen decide who she wants but she walks away when she hears the guys playing each other out.

Title: The One with Joey's Award
Abstract: Joey is nominated for a Soapy Award for his part on Days of Our Lives and Rachel is his date to the ceremony. Joey doesn't win the award but takes someone else's award home. Rachel convinces him to take it back because he can't be happy with an award he didn't win. One of Ross' students failed the midterms because he is in love with Ross and can't concentrate in class so Ross changes his grade. But now more students come to Ross pretending to be in love with him in order to get a better grade. When Rachel and Joey take the Soapy back the real winner just throws it away saying it's not good enough for her so Joey takes it back home. Monica really loves Chandler but it scares her that she will never have the rush of the beginning of meeting someone new again. Chandler reassures her and she realizes she is going to have a lot of new things with Chandler as well.

Title: The One with Ross and Monica's Cousin
Abstract: Joey auditions for a naked role in a big movie. Rachel and Phoebe plan Monica's wedding shower. Ross becomes attracted to his cousin after she visits.

Title: The One with Rachel's Big Kiss
Abstract: Rachel's college friend can't remember a scandalous kiss from the past. Chandler and Ross argue for possession of Val Kilmer's tuxedo.

Title: The One with the Vows
Abstract: Monica and Chandler are getting married in four weeks and have to write their vows but neither has a clue what to say so they reflect on their past.

Title: The One with Chandler's Dad
Abstract: Ross and Rachel hit the freeway together when Monica's Porsche shows up again. Chandler and Monica go off to Vegas to find Chandler's estranged dad.

Title: The One with Monica and Chandler's Wedding: Part 1
Abstract: So close to the wedding Chandler suddenly realizes the overwhelming meaning of getting married. Meanwhile Joey acts opposite a famous actor in a movie but can't bring himself to tell him that he spits when he says his lines.

Title: The One with Monica and Chandler's Wedding: Part 2
Abstract: Ross tries to find Chandler with Phoebe's help. Meanwhile Rachel tries to hinder Monica.

Title: The One After I Do
Abstract: The gang learns that Rachel is pregnant. Joey tries to impress a Broadway director who's dating Chandler's mom. Chandler's shoes make it hard for him to dance.

Title: The One with the Red Sweater
Abstract: Monica Phoebe and Joey advise Rachel to tell the father about the pregnancy. Chandler and Ross lose the wedding photos.

Title: The One Where Rachel Tells...
Abstract: Monica and Chandler leave for their honeymoon. Joey and Phoebe don't have a key to Monica and Chandler's apartment and need to get in so they tell Treeger that there's a gas leak. A fireman comes to break the door in so they have to explain the broken door to Monica. Rachel finally tells Ross that she is pregnant and he's shocked - but he promises to be there for her - he even wants to marry her. Rachel doesn't want to marry Ross because they're not in love and she is certain that she can raise the child on her own. They go to the doctor together and look at the first picture of their baby.

Title: The One with the Videotape
Abstract: Ross and Rachel tell everyone about the night they were together. They have two different stories of how it happened until Ross accidentally reveals that he videotaped it. Not surprisingly everyone wants to see it.

Title: The One with Rachel's Date
Abstract: Phoebe dates Monica's sous-chef Tim and Monica doesn't fire him for Phoebe's sake. When Phoebe decides to dump Tim Monica can finally fire him. Rachel has a date with Kash a co-star on 'Days of Our Lives'. Ross thinks it's weird because whoever takes Rachel out takes his baby out too. He always pictured that his next child would grow up in a happy family. Rachel's date was terrible because she made the mistake of mentioning she was pregnant. Ross reassures her it isn't so bad because when she has the baby she will love someone more than she ever loved anyone.

Title: The One with the Halloween Party
Abstract: Monica and Chandler decide to throw a Halloween party. Phoebe runs into Ursula and her fianc√©e who knows nothing about the real Ursula.

Title: The One with the Stain
Abstract: Chandler hires a maid whom Monica suspects is stealing her clothing. Eric has trouble forgetting Ursula when he breaks up with her to date Phoebe.

Title: The One with the Stripper
Abstract: Chandler finds out that Monica had a bachelorette party with a stripper even though they promised not to have bachelor/bachelorette parties. Rachel takes Phoebe along to dinner with Rachel's dad because she is afraid her dad will be really angry when she tells him she's pregnant. Mr. Green is delighted to hear he will be a grandfather but freaks out when he finds out that Rachel isn't getting married so she just tells him that Ross won't marry her. Monica feels bad about having had a bachelorette party so she organizes a bachelor party including a stripper for Chandler. Joey is the only guest because Ross has a date with Mona that night and Chandler is embarrassed and doesn't really want to have the party at all. The stripper arrives but turns out to be a hooker. Mr. Green goes to see Ross to yell at him but unfortunately for Ross Mona is there too so they both start yelling at him. Rachel explains everything to her dad and to Mona who makes up with Ross.

Title: The One with the Rumor
Abstract: Monica invites Will an old school friend of her and Ross over for Thanksgiving dinner unaware he isn't too fond of Rachel.

Title: The One with Monica's Boots
Abstract: Monica's expensive new boots hurt her feet but she's determined to prove to Chandler that her purchase was worth it. Ben goes to school with Sting's son.

Title: The One with Ross's Step Forward
Abstract: Joey wants to take Rachel to dinner on a pretend date to practice his dating skills but soon develops romantic feelings for her. Monica Phoebe and Chandler are addicted to Mrs. Pacman.

Title: The One Where Joey Dates Rachel
Abstract: Joey wants to take Rachel to dinner on a pretend date to practice his dating skills but soon develops romantic feelings for her. The gang is addicted to Mrs. Pacman.

Title: The One Where Chandler Takes a Bath
Abstract: Monica turns Chandler on to the concept of taking a bath to relax. Ross and Rachel toss baby names around while deciding whether to learn the baby's sex.

Title: The One with the Secret Closet
Abstract: Chandler's very curious about a locked closet but Monica won't tell him what is inside.

Title: The One with the Birthing Video
Abstract: During Valentine's Day Chandler discovers the miracle of birth seeing an extremely graphic video.

Title: The One Where Joey Tells Rachel
Abstract: Ross freaks out when Joey tells him that he is in love with Rachel because Ross is afraid that they will get married and raise his kid together. Phoebe dates a guy called Don who she thinks is Monica's soul-mate and introduces Don to Monica to see what will happen. Monica and Don get along perfectly. Ross goes to tell Joey that he doesn't hate him and Joey promises to never act on his feelings for Rachel because he won't jeopardize his friendship to Ross. But when Ross realizes that Joey really is in love for the first time he tells Joey to tell Rachel. When Joey tells Rachel it is clear that she doesn't feel the same way about Joey and they both start crying.

Title: The One with the Tea Leaves
Abstract: Chandler and Monica are happy together - their worst problem is his habit to put CDs in the wrong box and their different taste in music. Rachel is desperate to get back on good terms with Joey so she takes Monica's advice to change the subject to something work-related. However in another uncomfortable conversation she manages to convince Joey that her boss Mr. Zelner wants to buy her baby. When Phoebe resumes reading tea leaves she sees that she'll meet the man of her dreams soon and takes that to be Jim who she keeps bumping into. However she soon finds he isn't quite that nice and may be too crazy even for her! Ross is determined to get his favorite pink ('light salmon shade') shirt back from Mona's so he sneaks in with the key and dives behind the couch when she enters with a studly new lover.

Title: The One in Massapequa
Abstract: Everyone prepares for the Gellers' 35th wedding anniversary in Long Island. Monica struggles to prepare the perfect toast. Phoebe invites her new boyfriend Parker.

Title: The One with Joey's Interview
Abstract: Joey prepares for his epic interview with Soap Opera Digest reminiscing about his past acting experiences his friends and his romantic life.

Title: The One with the Baby Shower
Abstract: Monica and Phoebe throw Rachel a baby shower but forget to invite Rachel's mom. Rachel realizes she has no idea how to look after the baby after the birth. Meanwhile Joey auditions for a job as a host for a new game show called 'Bamboozled' and Chandler and Ross help him practice.

Title: The One with the Cooking Class
Abstract: Monica's restaurant get a bad review. After confronting the critic who wrote it she decides to join a cooking class with Joey in tow. Rachel gets jealous when Ross hits it off with a woman at the baby department store.

Title: The One Where Rachel Is Late
Abstract: Monica and Phoebe bet on when Rachel's baby will be born as the due date comes and goes as Rachel becomes extremely irritable. Chandler falls asleep at Joey's big movie premiere.

Title: The One Where Rachel Has a Baby: Part 1
Abstract: Ross and Rachel go to the hospital to have their baby but it's a long labor. They get stuck in a semi-private room and many other couples come and go before Rachel is ready to deliver - the last couple being Janice and her new husband. Chandler and Monica decide to start trying to have a baby.

Title: The One Where Rachel Has a Baby: Part 2
Abstract: After Rachel gives birth to her baby she must confront relationship issues around her.

Title: The One Where No One Proposes
Abstract: Rachel thinks that Joey has proposed to her. Monica and Chandler begin trying to have a baby.

Title: The One Where Emma Cries
Abstract: Chandler having trouble getting enough sleep at home falls asleep in a meeting and accidentally agrees to run his company's Tulsa office.

Title: The One with the Pediatrician
Abstract: Joey arranges a blind date for Phoebe. Chandler is leaving for Tulsa without Monica because she has got a great job offer.

Title: The One with the Sharks
Abstract: Monica thinks Chandler is aroused by shark documentaries.

Title: The One with Phoebe's Birthday Dinner
Abstract: Phoebe will celebrate her birthday by having a dinner with her friends at a fancy restaurant. But everybody is late to the dinner due to a series of problems.

Title: The One with the Male Nanny
Abstract: Looking for a new nanny Ross and Rachel hire a male nanny named Sandy. Monica tells Chandler that a guy at work is the funniest guy she has ever met.

Title: The One with Ross's Inappropriate Song
Abstract: Ross finds a way to make Emma laugh - singing 'Baby Got Back'. Meanwhile Phoebe meets Mike's parents and Joey and Chandler find a video tape in Richard's apartment.

Title: The One with Rachel's Other Sister
Abstract: Rachel's middle sister shows up at Thanksgiving and causes arguments amongst the gang.

Title: The One with Rachel's Phone Number
Abstract: Rachel is ready to start hanging out again. She and Phoebe go to a bar where they meet two guys.

Title: The One with Christmas in Tulsa
Abstract: Chandler must spend Christmas in Tulsa which Monica thinks he might have an affair with a former Miss Oklahoma runner-up while he is there. Chandler comes home early to announce that he quit his job.

Title: The One Where Rachel Goes Back to Work
Abstract: Chandler starts looking for a job and is anxious about having a baby Rachel decides to go back to work and Phoebe works as an extra on Joey's show.

Title: The One with Phoebe's Rats
Abstract: Ross makes Joey stay away from their new nanny. Mike accidentally kills Phoebe's rat. Gavin gives Rachel a scarf and a kiss for her birthday.

Title: The One Where Monica Sings
Abstract: A night at Mike's piano bar gives Monica a very showy moment in the spotlight. Chandler employs his secret skill to repair Joey's botched eyebrow-waxing job.

Title: The One with the Blind Dates
Abstract: Phoebe and Joey purposely set Ross and Rachel up on bad dates in the hopes they'll get back together. Monica and Chandler babysit Emma.

Title: The One with the Mugging
Abstract: Joey gets a part in a stage-play in a painful way. Ross and Phoebe are mugged outside Central Perk. Phoebe realizes that she mugged Ross 18 years ago. Chandler starts his new career as advertising writer.

Title: The One with the Boob Job
Abstract: When Monica and Chandler both ask Joey for money not wanting the other to know why they are asking for it Chandler sees that Joey gave money to Monica. Joey makes up that Monica is getting a boob job. Phoebe asks Mike to move in with her but decides not to when she and Mike argue about their future. Rachel attempts to baby-proof the apartment but makes Joey go insane when he can't open anything.

Title: The One with the Memorial Service
Abstract: When Chandler and Ross joke around on their college website Ross is accused of being dead which leads to the fact that he was not popular in college. Joey is not willing to give his favorite stuffed animal Hugsy to Emma. Monica helps Phoebe not call Mike.

Title: The One with the Lottery
Abstract: Hoping to win a huge jackpot the friends pool their money and buy dozens of lottery tickets. However they bicker over how to spend the fortune if they win and Monica irritates everyone else by buying tickets just for her and Chandler.

Title: The One with Rachel's Dream
Abstract: After Rachel goes to the 'Days of our Lives' set with Joey she has a romantic dream about him or is she having a dream about Drake? Chandler surprises Monica with a weekend getaway. Although she can't go Chandler takes Ross instead. Phoebe drives everyone away from Monica's restaurant with her bad singing.

Title: The One with the Soap Opera Party
Abstract: Joey throws a cast party on the roof of his building where he ends up making out with an attractive professor that Ross had a crush on.

Title: The One with the Fertility Test
Abstract: Still unable to conceive Monica and Chandler decide to get tests done at a fertility clinic where they run into Chandler's favorite ex Janice. Rachel receives a gift certificate for a free massage at a chain massage center. Phoebe chastises Rachel for even thinking about going to a massage chain which she feels takes away business from independent massage therapists like herself. however Phoebe actually works at this specific massage chain. Rachel says she won't go and even tears up the gift certificate but she later tapes it back together goes for her free massage and gets Phoebe as her masseuse. Joey and Charlie's relationship progresses. Joey confides in Ross that Charlie might be too smart for him. As Charlie wants to go to the 'Met' (not to see 'The Mets' as Joey originally assumes) Ross coaches Joey on the museum's layout and certain paintings on a planned route through the museum.

Title: The One with the Donor
Abstract: After finding about their chances of getting pregnant Monica and Chandler search for the perfect guy to give them his sperm to get them a baby. Ross works on writing his speech. Charlie goes shopping with Phoebe and Rachel which makes Charlie think Phoebe likes Joey. Phoebe shops for the perfect dress for a party that Mike is going to be at but she bumps into David on the way and forgets about the party. Monica and Chandler decide to adopt children instead of getting a donor.

Title: The One in Barbados
Abstract: Chandler gives advice to David but that makes David want to propose to Phoebe. Although Phoebe is still in love with Mike. Monica calls Mike who shows up there right in the middle of David's proposal. Mike proposes instead. Phoebe gets back together with Mike but doesn't accept his proposal. Monica's hair gets all poofy after getting off the plane. Charlie and Ross enjoy themselves when rewriting Ross's speech. Rachel keeps changing her mind on when to tell Joey that she has feelings for him.

Title: The One in Barbados
Abstract: Charlie dumps Joey for Ross. Rachel finally tells Joey that she has had feelings for him. Joey doesn't want to proceed with Rachel because he couldn't do that to Ross. But after he sees Charlie and Ross kissing he heads upstairs to share a romantic kiss with Rachel. Monica's hair keeps growing. Monica and Mike compete in an unfriendly way.

Title: The One After Joey and Rachel Kiss
Abstract: Joey and Ross both attempt to come clean to each other that they're dating Rachel and Charlie. Phoebe finds out Mike has another girlfriend.

Title: The One Where Ross Is Fine
Abstract: Rachel and Joey fear for Ross's state of mind after he finds out about their relationship. Chandler and Monica visit some friends of Phoebe to get advice on adoption. Frank and the triplets come to visit.

Title: The One with Ross's Tan
Abstract: Ross goes to a tanning salon but fails to follow the 'simple' instructions. Joey and Rachel struggle to make the transition from friends to lovers. Monica and Phoebe try to avoid an annoying woman that used to live in their building.

Title: The One with the Cake
Abstract: On Emma's first birthday Ross and Rachel convince everyone to delay their plans so they can attend her party however plans go awry when Emma's birthday cake is revealed.

Title: The One Where Rachel's Sister Babysits
Abstract: Rachel's sister Amy comes to visit and moves in with her and Joey. Phoebe constantly and accidentally ruins Mike's proposals. Joey struggles to write a letter of recommendation for Monica and Chandler's adoption agency.

Title: The One with Ross' Grant
Abstract: Ross applies for a paleontology grant and finds out Charlie's ex-boyfriend reviews the applications. Monica and Rachel fight over who has to take Phoebe's ugly painting.

Title: The One with the Home Study
Abstract: Monica and Chandler nervously prepare for a visit from an adoption worker. Phoebe and Mike keep changing their minds about donating their wedding money to charity. Ross fights Rachel's fear of swings.

Title: The One with the Late Thanksgiving
Abstract: Joey Ross Rachel and Phoebe convince Monica and Chandler to host Thanksgiving however the four of them end up arriving to dinner an hour late.

Title: The One with the Birth Mother
Abstract: Nervous and excited Monica and Chandler travel to Ohio to meet a young pregnant woman Erica Simmons who is considering allowing them to adopt her child when it's born.

Title: The One Where Chandler Gets Caught
Abstract: Chandler and Monica have decided they want to raise their offspring in a suburban house and even find a perfect one in Westchester. Rachel and Phoebe see Chandler enter a car with his realtor Nancy and think he's cheating on Monica. After that misunderstanding is cleared the other Friends are shocked the couple wants to leave Manhattan and everybody starts reminiscing about living in New York as a gang until Nancy calls about their bid on the house.

Title: The One Where the Stripper Cries
Abstract: Old secrets come to light when Ross and Chandler attend a college reunion. Monica and Rachel throw Phoebe a bachelorette party. Joey appears as a celebrity partner on a game show.

Title: The One with Phoebe's Wedding
Abstract: Chaos ensues as Phoebe and Mike prepare to get married.

Title: The One Where Joey Speaks French
Abstract: Phoebe tries to teach Joey to speak French for an audition. Ross and Rachel head out to Long Island after her dad has a heart attack.

Title: The One with Princess Consuela
Abstract: When Phoebe goes to get her name changed she realizes she can change it to anything she wants so she changes it to Princess Consuela Banana Hammock to Mike's displeasure. Chandler finds out that Monica never changed her last name. Monica and Chandler take Joey to their house to convince him it is a good move and he tries to find anything wrong with the house so they won't buy it. Rachel goes to a job interview at a restaurant but her current boss is sitting right beyond her costing her her job at Ralph Lauren. When cleaning out her office she bumps into Mark who takes her for dinner to discuss a job offer for her. And Ross got tenure.

Title: The One Where Estelle Dies
Abstract: Ross tries to get Rachel to go back to Ralph Lauren. Joey doesn't know that his agent has died and Monica and Chandler bump into Janice.

Title: The One with Rachel's Going Away Party
Abstract: The gang throws Rachel a goodbye party during which she says goodbye to everybody individually.

Title: The Last One: Part 1
Abstract: Erica gives birth to the baby that Monica and Chandler are adopting. However there's one small added surprise. Meanwhile Ross and Rachel sleep together one last time before Rachel leaves to start a new life in Paris but Ross realises that he still loves her.

Title: The Last One: Part 2
Abstract: Phoebe races Ross to the airport in a bid to stop Rachel from leaving for Paris. Monica and Chandler pack up their apartment ahead of their move to their new house and Joey buys Chandler a new chick and duck as a leaving present.
